name: DayaLima Recruitment
description: DayaLima Recruitment redefined its recruitment by integrating talent and technology. Currently, reinforced by the job marketplace platform, Klob.id, which currently has hundreds thousands subscribers, strengthens DayaLima Recruitment’s talent sourcing projections. Founded in 1998 – a challenging year for the nation – , Daya Dimensi Indonesia has been the strategic partner of Development Dimensions International, a behavioural-based human resources consultant headquartered in Pittsburgh. Originally specialized in talent management and assessment, Daya Dimensi Indonesia’s excellent business conduct through the period of political and social turmoil in Indonesia has led clients to demand for a new function: Recruitment.
business_objectives: Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Headline: We create Leaders of a New Planet.
ShortDescription: DayaLima Recruitment provides comprehensive end-to-end recruitment solutions to clients.
enhanced_description: DayaLima Recruitment offers comprehensive, end-to-end recruitment solutions, integrating advanced technology with talent acquisition expertise. Leveraging its proprietary job marketplace platform, Klob.id, which boasts hundreds of thousands of subscribers, the service excels in strategic talent sourcing projections. Originating as a specialized recruitment function from Daya Dimensi Indonesia, an established HR consulting firm (founded 1998, partner of Development Dimensions International) with a background in talent management and assessment, DayaLima Recruitment is designed to meet diverse client expectations and boost hiring manager confidence and productivity.
